content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Can you please provide the number of parking permits currently issued within the Broomhill residents parking area.
Please indicate:
1) How many resident's parking permits issued
2) How many visitor permit books
3) The number of houses that have 1 residents permit issued
4) The number of houses that have 2 residents permits issued
4) The number of houses that have 3 or more residents permits issued.
Yours faithfully,
James Little

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please pass this on to the person who conducts Freedom of Information reviews.
I am writing to request an internal review of Sheffield City Council's handling of my FOI request 'Parking permits Broomhill parking area'.
This request should have been actioned some time ago.
A full history of my FOI request and all correspondence is available on the Internet at this address:
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/p...
Yours faithfully,
James Little
